languages.text: "Расклад простой: ты ждешь на моем корабле, пока я во всем разбираюсь, или бесславно погибаешь от моих рук".
"It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."
languages.original_text: "Расклад простой: ты ждешь на моем корабле, пока я во всем разбираюсь, или бесславно погибаешь от моих рук".

traits.locale_text: "The terms are plain: you wait on my ship while I sort things out or perish ignominiously by my hand."
"The terms are plain: you wait on my ship while I sort things out or perish ignominiously by my hand."
"The terms are plain: you wait on my ship while I sort things out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."
"The terms are plain: you wait on my ship while I sort things out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."
"It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."
"It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

languages.text: «Esto es muy simple: o espera en mi nave mientras yo me encargo de todo o muere con deshonor ante mí».
languages.original_text: "It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es muy simple: o espera en mi nave mientras yo me encargo de todo o muere con deshonor ante mí».

languages.text: “这件事情很简单——要么把所有事情交给我处理，你在我的船上乖乖等我，要么你像只过街老鼠一样，死在我手上。”
languages.original_text: "It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情很简单——要么把所有事情交给我处理，你在我的船上乖乖等我，要么你像只过街老鼠一样，死在我手上。”

languages.text: 「すべて簡単なことだ。{mf|俺|私}がすべてを片付ける間、君は{mf|俺|私}の船で待つか、{mf|俺|私}の手で屈辱のうちに死ぬかだ」
languages.original_text: "It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

traits.locale_text: 「すべて簡単なことだ。{mf|俺|私}がすべてを片付ける間、君は{mf|俺|私}の船で待つか、{mf|俺|私}の手で屈辱のうちに死ぬかだ」

languages.text: « C'est bien simple : soit vous attendez patiemment à bord de mon vaisseau le temps que je démêle cette histoire, soit je vous tue sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien simple : soit vous attendez patiemment à bord de mon vaisseau le temps que je démêle cette histoire, soit je vous tue sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: "Çok basit... Ya ben işleri yoluna koyarken gemimde beklersiniz ya da burada aşağılık bir şekilde can verirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

traits.locale_text: "Çok basit... Ya ben işleri yoluna koyarken gemimde beklersiniz ya da burada aşağılık bir şekilde can verirsiniz."

languages.text: "Eigentlich ist alles recht einfach: Ihr wartet auf meinem Schiff, bis ich alles geregelt habe, oder Ihr sterbt sang- und klanglos durch meine Hand."
languages.original_text: "It is all quite simple: either you wait on my ship while I sort everything out, or you perish ignominiously by my hand."

traits.locale_text: "Eigentlich ist alles recht einfach: Ihr wartet auf meinem Schiff, bis ich alles geregelt habe, oder Ihr sterbt sang- und klanglos durch meine Hand."
